infos.value: It seems a dispute over succession to the throne broke out with the birth of a concubine's child. That was almost twenty years ago.
Then that means the successor to King Khury...
Oh, there is one. Her name is Glaciela.
Another valiant lady. Well, not that I'm in such a position to say so.
I had thought to wed one of my sons to Glaciela...
N-no... Father is just saying that.
Gwahaha. It seems only Lady Machérie will do.
Even so, I see no ill in sitting Sterne upon the throne of Wezette.
In other words, the alliance between Wezette and Leonis is bound by—
That's right. It's a matter of heirs, but that's not all there is to it.
I have absolutely no intention of being a vassal of Wezette.
That said, I will gladly offer my assistance if it brings us closer to defeating Muraga.
Hmm. Well then, let us make haste.
